text: Peter Muduhwa (born 11 August 1993) is a Zimbabwean footballer who plays as a defender for Highlanders F.C. and the Zimbabwe national football team. ==Career== ===International=== Muduhwa made his senior international debut on 26 March 2017 in a 0-0 friendly draw with Zambia. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Highlanders F.C. players Category:Zimbabwe Premier Soccer League players Category:Zimbabwean footballers Category:Zimbabwe international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Bulawayo
title: Peter Muduhwa
